Fred
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Monster Types: ColorPandora: Fred
By Varthlokkur on Tuesday, February 13, 2001 - 07:27 am:

Just as a benchmark for you Torey, here is a third generation ColorPandora I had. Unfortunately, I raised him in the early days before my raising technique was honed. But, I liked him.

Fred - Pure ColorPandora (3rd Generation, parents were ColorPandora)

Lived: 5y 4m S-Class
Record: 59W 0L 22KOs
Fame: 100 Nature: Best

Lif: 390 Pow: 123
Int: 539 Ski: 547
Spd: 281 Def: 509

Techs: Errantries: 5
Face Attack, Giant Whip
Tail Swing, Two Swings, Kamikaze
Cracker, Triple Shots, Mega Cracker
Shotgun, Giant Wheel, Spiral Rush, Mega Shotgun, Meteor Dive

I look back upon Fred and wish I could do him over. He would be a HoFer today with my raising technique. BTW, his two best techs were Shotgun and Mega Shotgun. I loved Kamikaze.

As for his lineage, one parent was a B-Class Liquid Cube (ColorPandora/Jell) and the other was an A-Class Tram ColorPandora/????).

I really enjoy ColorPandoras, I'll have to put one on the short list of things to raise. First, though, I need to raise, in order, a Hopper, a Durahan, a Ghost, a Joker and a Zilla. Whew!

Varthlokkur
